title: Balochistan CM briefs PM
content:
QUETTA, April 23 (APP): Balochistan Chief Minister Abdul Qaddus Bizinjo Saturday briefed Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif over the administrative issues and the law and order situation in the province.
The chief minister also apprised the prime minister about the steps taken to control the price hike.
The prime minister also directed to ensure the supply of daily commodities at fixed prices.
